name: あけおめ2023
description:
PC & Mac Browser only

WASD for control

あけましておめでとうございます！

皆様がいい初夢見れますように

Happy new year 2023!

Wish you have a lucky first dream.

Please excuse the rough edges, I barely got timeline working to publish in time. Future polish and bug fixes are right around the corner.
